author: Andrew Jackson
comment: I've tried 101 faces since I got my moto 360. Now I think Rider from weareal is the one I have been looking for.. Well done guys! Whoops, now I have a problem. After one day, the app won't recognise my location (Rønne, Denmark), always OK with other apps. Can I use another weather app here?

author: Javier Chang
comment: Very nice watchfaces for Huawei smartwatch. Very classic. High quality. Would like to be able to control the ambient brightness independent of the active mode. I wanted to purchase the airpower watchfaces but the lack of color customization was a deal breaker for me. Please bring more classic watchfaces. Thank you

author: Chris Vittorio
comment: Great faces cool animations when you move your wrist.

author: L Walker
comment: Best free Android wear watch faces can't complain brilliant

author: sharif s
comment: Awesome! Waiting for more free faces

author: soarin soars
comment: It isn't good. Only has three free faces that still aren't customisable

author: Kai Lian
comment: very impressive reflection and shadow on the watch face. developer got good idea for the app. however, the wach face choice are limited. I am looking closely for you new product and willing to pay for the good one!

author: SCAN2 NYC
comment: 6 watch faces. Meh. Uninstalled

author: dave W
comment: Weareal is one of  the best and most convincing  watch face apps that money can buy.  Clean sharp classy.

author: Kud Ramban
comment: Keeps telling me that I need to connect to android wear when it is connected all the time

reply.author: Weareal
reply.content: Hi, please try to restart your watch. And if your watch is on Wear 2.0 please check for updates for Weareal on Google Play on watch. Thanks. You can send us an email for more details on contact@weareal.com

author: Troy S.
comment: After a year of use the rider is still my default face for my 2nd gen Moto 360. After the wear 2 update the weather doesn't work and I assume it will be fixed. I have not found another free watchface that looks so good and has the complications I want, watch battery life and date. I really like being able to do full color ambient and the realistic​ reflection but they do seem to rotate/move a bit more than I would like. Thanks Weareal and keep up the good work.

author: Chris Blacktopp
comment: I really like the Rider face in blue on my Zenwatch 2 it looks great. The only slight negative, you have to manually set your city location for the weather. It isn't set by your location which for a person that travels alot can be tiresome. Still a great free watch face thank you

author: Naveen Kumar Sunkari
comment: The description mentions AirPower watch face as free(not specifically though, it misleads that as free) , but on installing, the AirPower watch face is paid in app purchase. Rest of all free watch faces are not so good and not worth trying also. My suggestion is to go for Facer app which has lot of free watch faces

author: Robert Vail
comment: As most Android watch owners, I've tried a lot of different watch faces and I keep coming back to Weareal. If they could just fix the weather complication I'd be 100% happy.

author: Michael Ch'ng
comment: Please make sure your new update is battery friendly as I found out that the Watch Faces are consuming a lot of battery power comparing those models which are from others

reply.author: Weareal
reply.content: Hi, we are working on the new digital model right now. Upd: because it requires way more time that one week

author: Michael Surgey
comment: It was easy to set up and use  for an old crusty like me The watch faces were just the ones I was looking for 😀😀👍

author: ahmad owis
comment: It's really good but seems like it's not updating weather information, I am running wear 2.0

reply.author: Weareal
reply.content: Hello, thanks! Is your watch on Wear 1.x or 2.0? Please drop us an email on contact@weareal.com. UPD: Please check in play store on watch do you have any updates for Weareal. In the latest version you can choose your city manually, and get rig of problems with not working device location

author: John Gabbard
comment: Absolutely extraordinary work here!!! Probably some of the best ART i've seen on a watch face! Five stars all the way across the board! You guys deserved it!

author: Andrew Baudo
comment: Worked great. However after update can not get days of the week.  Please advise when you have time.

author: John Lo
comment: doesn't work with sony smartwatch 2. how about samsung gear s2

author: Aydin Dogan
comment: Great face, but the Google weather widget is only shown in F, can't seem to switch it to C. Can this be done?

reply.author: Weareal
reply.content: Hi, you can use Weareal Weather and switch unit the app settings. And I don`t know how to do it in Google's, its not related to our watch faces in any way. Try to find it in Google Weather app.

author: Nishant Balasubramanian
comment: My fav watch face isn't animating anymore in my Sony SmartWatch 3

reply.author: Weareal
reply.content: Hello. Is watch face works correctly for you right now?

author: Cesar Chang
comment: I always keep coming back to this. I test a lot of watch faces but this is by far better looking.

author: Shannon Kane
comment: Nice watch faces but, would like to see a tad more customization.

author: John Farley
comment: Beautiful watch faces! I especially love the Rider. It is elegant and useful.

author: Farzan Kashefi
comment: Best watch face ever!!!! & Works perfectly on Moto 360 1st generation

author: raymond simpkins
comment: Good watch face realistic customisable

author: Daniel Guenther
comment: Very very cool!

author: Carole Dubreuil
comment: The faces are beautiful

author: Harshit Surya
comment: Pretty nice

author: MR HOWELLTHREE
comment: Nice

author: 陈思越
comment: cool

author: Michael Fryer
comment: Revising my last review. Thanks to a quick respond from developer, I fix my problem. The watch face looks great on my LG Watch Sport!

reply.author: Weareal
reply.content: Hello. Have you tried to tap again on that model on model switcher screen? Please send more details on contact@weareal.com. Thank you

author: Elite ARO
comment: Watch faces look amazing.

author: Keith Noble
comment: As with previous reviews. Takes 79p and then does not work.  Seems to be a bit of a rip off. First ever app that I've downloaded that does not work......The developers contacted me fairly quickly and sorted the problem.  From one star to five, all are working fine, thank you

reply.author: Weareal
reply.content: Hello. We are working on it. Please provide more info what exactly is not working on contact@weareal.com

author: Shawn Green
comment: I bought the watch face for 99 cents every went through but I can't add the watch face to my watch... It still says 99 cents... Update working with support to figure out the issue

reply.author: Weareal
reply.content: hello. the issue is fixed in the last update. sorry about that

author: Brian Offin
comment: Love the addition of step complication shame mine has said 539 since the update... PLEASE FIX OR Allow US TO DISABLE THE THIRD COMPLICATION

reply.author: Weareal
reply.content: Hello. The issue is fixed in the last update. Also we added ability to disable the third complication

author: David Figueroa
comment: Please add access to calendars , phone and messages shortcut that' will be nice for this type of watch face. paid 99 cents for this..... There are other watch faces with these add ons and more for the same price..... Will give 5 stars when done...

author: Lex Leonard
comment: They broke it. Can't select face widgets.

reply.author: Weareal
reply.content: Hello. The issue is fixed in the last update. Sorry about that
